Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Lantern = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local equipped = false
local activated = false
local hauntDamage = 15
local dragonSpirit local dragonSpirit2 local dragonSpirit3
local dragonPart = Instance.new("Part") dragonPart.Name = "DRAGON" dragonPart.FormFactor = 3 dragonPart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 3) dragonPart.Transparency = 0.5 dragonPart.CanCollide = false dragonPart.Anchored = true
local dragonSound
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local dragonMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") dragonMesh.MeshId = "" dragonMesh.TextureId = "" dragonMesh.Parent = dragonPart
dragonSpirit = dragonPart:Clone() dragonSpirit.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70429237" dragonSpirit.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70429281"
dragonSpirit2 = dragonSpirit:Clone()
dragonSpirit3 = dragonPart:Clone() dragonSpirit3.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70429256" dragonSpirit3.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=70429300"
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, dragonPart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0)
local radius1 = 5 local radius2 = 3 local radius3 = 4
local theta1 = 0 local theta2 = math.pi/2 local theta3 = 3*math.pi/2
local phi1 = 0 local phi2 = math.pi/2 local phi3 = 3*math.pi/2
local dt1 = 0.02 local dt2 = 0.030 local dt3 = -0.025
local dp1 = -0.01 local dp2 = 0.025 local dp3 = -0.035
function animateDragons() while dragonSpirit and dragonSpirit2 and dragonSpirit3 and equipped do if not activated then -- animate them theta1 = theta1 + dt1 theta2 = theta2 + dt2 theta3 = theta3 + dt3
phi1 = phi1 + dp1 phi2 = phi2 + dp2 phi3 = phi3 + dp3
-- calc positions local pos1 = radius1 * Vector3.new(math.sin(theta1) * math.cos(phi1), math.sin(phi1), math.cos(theta1) * math.cos(phi1)) local pos2 = radius2 * Vector3.new(math.sin(theta2) * math.cos(phi2), math.sin(phi2), math.cos(theta2) * math.cos(phi2)) local pos3 = radius3 * Vector3.new(math.sin(theta3) * math.cos(phi3), math.sin(phi3), math.cos(theta3) * math.cos(phi3))
-- render them dragonSpirit.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos1 + Lantern.Position, myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 25) dragonSpirit2.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos2 + Lantern.Position, myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 25) dragonSpirit3.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos3 + Lantern.Position, myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 25) end wait() end end
function haunt(hit, phantom) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then if phantom then hauntDamage = 24 else hauntDamage = 15 end humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(hauntDamage) if phantom then phantom:Destroy() end end end end
function findTarget(target) local AOE = Vector3.new(12, 12, 12) local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(target - AOE, target + AOE), vCharacter, 100) local minDistance = math.huge local targetTorso = nil for i = 1, #parts do local character = parts[i].Parent if character then local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then local distance = (target - torso.Position).magnitude if torso and distance < minDistance then minDistance = distance targetTorso = torso end end end end return targetTorso end
function flameIt(torso) if dragonSpirit and dragonSpirit2 and dragonSpirit3 then local s1 = dragonSpirit:Clone() local s2 = dragonSpirit2:Clone() local s3 = dragonSpirit3:Clone()
s1.Anchored = false s2.Anchored = false s3.Anchored = false
dragonSpirit.Transparency = 1.0 dragonSpirit2.Transparency = 1.0 dragonSpirit3.Transparency = 1.0
local d1 = (torso.Position - s1.Position).unit local d2 = (torso.Position - s2.Position).unit local d3 = (torso.Position - s3.Position).unit
local f1 = float:Clone() f1.Parent = s1
local f2 = float:Clone() f2.Parent = s2
local f3 = float:Clone() f3.Parent = s3
s1.Velocity = d1 * 50.0 s2.Velocity = d2 * 50.0 s3.Velocity = d3 * 50.0
s1.Parent = game.Workspace s2.Parent = game.Workspace s3.Parent = game.Workspace
debris:AddItem(s1, 8) debris:AddItem(s2, 8) debris:AddItem(s3, 8)
s1.Touched:connect(function(hit) haunt(hit, s1) end) s2.Touched:connect(function(hit) haunt(hit, s2) end) s3.Touched:connect(function(hit) haunt(hit, s3) end) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint
local targetTorso = findTarget(target)
if targetTorso then activated = true flameIt(targetTorso) else -- Just make them go towards the target, say 50 studs distance, should they attack anyone? Not sure end
wait(7.0) Tool.Enabled = true activated = false dragonSpirit.Transparency = 0.0 dragonSpirit2.Transparency = 0.0 dragonSpirit3.Transparency = 0.0 end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
dragonSpirit.Parent = vCharacter dragonSpirit2.Parent = vCharacter dragonSpirit3.Parent = vCharacter
equipped = true
dc1 = dragonSpirit.Touched:connect(haunt) dc2 = dragonSpirit2.Touched:connect(haunt) dc3 = dragonSpirit3.Touched:connect(haunt)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(animateDragons))
dragonSound = Lantern:FindFirstChild("DragonSound") if dragonSound then dragonSound:Play() end end
function onUnequipped() equipped = false if dragonSpirit then dragonSpirit.Parent = nil end if dragonSpirit2 then dragonSpirit2.Parent = nil end if dragonSpirit3 then dragonSpirit3.Parent = nil end
if dragonSound then dragonSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Lantern = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer
local sg local frame
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("LanternGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "LanternGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 260, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -130, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
local genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 127/255, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Haunt your enemies with these spirits!"
end end end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
